greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The largest prime whose square divides the first nonsquarefree number on row n of Pascal's triangle, 1 if all terms on that row are squarefree.
xref: Differs from A249717 for the first time at n=36, where a(36) = 3, while A249717(36) = 2.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 04 2014
